name: Dying To Win!!!
description:
Dying To Win is the new hit gameshow! Can you survive long enough against the mass hoards of the undead!? Try build and survive while the camera rotates out of your control, that may make things harder, but sorry folks, that's show business! 

Dying To Win is a collaborative project between myself and https://yairvich.itch.io/  created in 48 hours for the 2021 Kenney Jam, themed "Rotation". Sadly due to some build issues we missed the dealine by *drumroll* 1 minute, which means we can't enter, it's a shame but oh well. Thankfully we both still learned a lot from the experience. 

Give it a play and have a good time!
